sentence.Network_en: Schroeder was apparently the first to offer some information about the benthic algae.

sentence.Network_en: Benthic meiobenthos is one of the most important community to biomedical research.

sentence.Network_en: The present invention relates to raising technology of benthic aquatic animal.
